overview:
Ludovic Ulrich is the Global Program Manager for the BizSpark program

Microsoft BizSpark = fast-track the success of your startups with software, support & visibility.

Startups must be less than three years old, less than a million dollars in revenue and privately-held to qualify. The program offers software for the development and ongoing operation of marketing visibility. Since the launch of BizSpark, over 35,000 companies in over 100 countries have joined the program.

The BizSpark program was designed with the lifecycle of a startup in mind to remove upfront costs and have minimal eligibility requirements. The program connects these startups to a growing global community of over 2,500 Network Partners â€“ organizations with a common goal of supporting entrepreneurship, who can help entrepreneurs navigate the challenges of growing a new business.

milestones.description: Ludovic Ulrich became Global Program Manager for BizSpark @ Microsoft Corp
Ludovic Ulrich became CDO at Startup Weekend
